normalized_lines: Lemon Herb Chicken With Pan Sauce
Pat chicken dry and season with salt and pepper.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear chicken 5 to 6 minutes per side, then transfer to a plate.
Lower heat and add garlic; cook 30 seconds.
Add stock and scrape browned bits from the pan.
Whisk in butter, mustard, and lemon juice.
Return chicken to pan and simmer 5 minutes.
Finish with parsley and serve with rice and lemon wedges.
Chef's note: add a splash of cream for a richer sauce.
Nutrition disclaimer: values are estimates only.
